translations: 茁长素；[生化]植物生长激素（auxin 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Auxins are produced mainly by young developing leaves on actively growing shoots.
sentences.translation: 生长素主要是从旺盛生长新梢上正在发育的幼叶产生出来。

sentences.sentence: The green shoot-bud regeneration rates of calli were affected by combinations of different auxins in regeneration medium.
sentences.translation: 分化培养基上不同激素配比也影响其绿苗再生率。

sentences.sentence: Auxins, one of the best-known plant growth factors, have an extremely wide spectrum of activity, and are particularly important.
sentences.translation: 生长素- - -最被大众所熟知的植物激素之一，是一种相当重要，且具有相当广谱的调控活性范围的植物生长调节激素。
